fergal_ironforge.name: Fergal Ironforge
fergal_ironforge.desc: The son of a prominent smith and knight as well as a smith and knight himself, he spends most of his time either in the forge or training himself and his household.

talbot.name: Talbot
talbot.desc: A former soldier who served under and befriened [link:side_characters,fergal_ironforge]. His cultivation had stagnated until he entered the Ironforge family's service, where he was able to advance.

jov_broom.name: Joveta Broom
jov_broom.desc: Danny's younger sister. Lives on Throughwoode Lane with her family.

david_broom.name: David Broom
david_broom.desc: One of Danny's older brothers and a member of the Riverfrost Guard.

josh_broom.name: Joshua Broom
josh_broom.desc: One of Danny's older brothers and an enforcer for the Icicle Syndicate.

ms_joyfield.name: Ms. Joyfield
ms_joyfield.desc: The teacher at the school Alric and Danny go to.

morcar.name: Morcar
morcar.desc: A bard employed at the Squeaky Hinge, he takes Danny as an aprentice to get out of doing work.

ash.name: Ash
ash.desc: A blue jay that Danny befriends.
